goals__remit: First Solar is a leading global provider of comprehensive photovoltaic (PV) solar systems which use its advanced thin-film modules. With an installed capacity of over 10 gigawatts worldwide – from mega utility-scale solar plants and commercial & industrial rooftop systems to kilowatt-sized community off-grid systems – the company’s integrated power plant solutions deliver an economically attractive alternative to fossil-fuel electricity generation today. The company’s leadership in renewable energy is a result of its deep expertise and over a decade-long track record in R&D, manufacturing, developing, financing, engineering, constructing or operating the world’s leading sources of sustainable, solar energy. For more information visit www.firstsolar.com

relevant_communication:
Supported the development of several position papers of the European Photovoltaic Industry Association (EPIA) - now SolarPower Europe on technical and economical evolution of the European Electricity markets towards a market enabling further deployment of clean energy generation technologies and empowering the consumers to become prosumers. 
 
Supported the Product Environmental Footprint Pilot Project "PV Electricity Generation" as part of the PEF Pilot phase of the European Commission. 
 
Supported development of industry standards on recycling of photovoltaic panels.
